TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 Windows Vista 之 自訂位置集合中的項目。

span.span: Represents an entry in a custom place collection for Windows Vista.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 上的預設開啟和儲存對話方塊，在 [最愛的連結] 對話方塊左側有一個區域。The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**. 這個區域稱為自訂位置。This area is called custom places. 此類別代表自訂的位置。This class represents a custom place. 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]，這個類別並沒有任何影響。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.

related.span: 如何：將自訂位置加入至檔案對話方塊

span.span: How To: Add a Custom Place to a File Dialog Box

related.span: 檔案對話方塊自訂位置的已知資料夾 GUID

span.span: Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 已知資料夾 GUID 所識別的自訂位置，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得一份可用[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]已知的資料夾，請參閱[檔案對話方塊自訂位置的已知資料夾 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md)中的 KnownFolders.h 檔案或[!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]。For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂位置的 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 已知資料夾 GUID。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID for the custom place.

value.span: ，指出自訂位置的 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 已知資料夾。

span.span: A that indicates the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder for the custom place.

value.span: 如果已經使用資料夾路徑指定自訂位置，則會傳回空的 GUID。

span.span: If the custom place was specified with a folder path, then an empty GUID is returned.

value.span: 取得一份可用[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]已知的資料夾，請參閱[檔案對話方塊自訂位置的已知資料夾 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md)中的 KnownFolders.h 檔案或[!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]。

span.span: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
